pair.intro: Enter the details of your Nuki Bridge.
pair.query_nuki_servers: Connecting to Nuki Servers. Please wait...
pair.more_than_one_bridge: More than one Nuki Bridge was detected. Please select a Bridge.
pair.press_bridge_button: Press the button on your Nuki Bridge within 30 seconds.
pair.button_not_pressed: Bridge button not pressed within 30 seconds
pair.discovery_disabled: The API Quick discovery in your Nuki Bridge is disabled
pair.http_api_disabled: The HTTP API in your Nuki Bridge is disabled. Make sure the HTTP API in your Nuki Bridge is enabled. You can do this within the Nuki smartphone app. Go to "Manage my devices" and select "Bridge". There you can enable the HTTP API.
pair.try_manual_pairing: You can continue with the manual pairing.

util.404: Device is unknown, please re-pair your Nuki

driver.no_token: Did not receive a token from the bridge, make sure you push the bridge button during pairing.
